name: AWK: Adventures of Walker King
storyline: Having famous Hollywood parents, Walker King knew all too well about the downsides of fame and the difficulty of keeping a private personal life. In order to avoid trouble, Walker is sent off to boarding school where he dives into his passion of DJing. However, trouble ends up finding Walker anyways as his DJ NO1 persona gains traction and his dorm room music livestreams get him kicked out of boarding school. Now back in LA, Walker is unsure of how to move forward with his life.
summary: AWK follows the journey of a young DJ who returns home from boarding school to figure out his path in life. Join Walker as he navigates life in LA with his best friends, finds love, and discovers secrets - all while trying to balance his growth and newfound fame as DJ NO1.
